an10.229-232:1.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato idhekacco kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati …pe…
an10.229-232:1.2: idhekacco kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an10.229-232:1.5: cattarisaya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato idhekacco kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati …pe…
an10.229-232:1.6: idhekacco kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati”.
